revised_title: Corrections to Biographical Memoirs of Fellows of the Royal Society
tldr: This article provides corrections to the Biographical Memoirs of Fellows of the Royal Society, including updates to the bibliography and a correction to the title of a distinguished professor. It also corrects a typo in the text regarding look-follow radar, which should be lock-folFow radar.
scientific_discipline: Social Sciences, Art, and Humanities > Biographies and Book Reviews
